channel.title: S&P 500 on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in S&P 500 on FinanClub

item.title: NWL
item.description: score:-31 Chances: Newell Brands reported Q2 earnings that surpassed estimates, which could be a positive sign for the company’s performance. Blackstone and Airbnb are set to join the S&P 500, potentially indicating a positive sentiment in the market, which might benefit Newell Brands.

item.title: KVUE
item.description: score:-17 Chances: Kenvue becomes a fully independent company following the separation from Johnson & Johnson, which could lead to growth opportunities. Kenvue is set to join the S&P 500, indicating positive recognition in the market. Strong second-quarter 2023 results and a positive annual profit forecast may boost investor confidence.
